Text:
Extends standard Age of Empires 4 game mode with more game options.

Additional features included in current version of the mod:
Win Conditions
- Regicide (Defeat Kings.)
- Sudden Death (Destroy Landmark Town Centers. Additional non-landmark town centers are disabled.)
Win Conditions Options
- Sacred Timer
- Wonder Timer
- Team Solidarity (All teammates are eliminated if one is removed from game.)
Diplomacy Options
- Treaty Timer
- Enable Tribute
- Enable Diplomacy
Match Options
- Start Type (Settled, Slow Nomad, Scattered Villagers)
- Last Age
- Game Rates
- Technology Level
- Game Simulation Speed (Only for single player)
- Population Capacity
Units Options
- Spawn King
- Spawn Castle
- Starting Villagers
Other
- Ding (Easter Egg)
- Early Market
- Destroyable Trees
Current option also enables you to recreate game modes such as Deathmatch, Wonder Rush...

Source code, feedback, bug reports or contribution to mode can be done at: https://github.com/search?q=AOE4-AdvancedGameSettings (This is link to search results, due to chat filter my git nickname is censored, It should be always first result.)

Advanced Game Settings provides you with a variety of match options and win conditions to customize your game and play it how you want to.
HELP:
To see all options you need to scroll down.
Options tagged as SP are not supported in multiplayer matches.
Full description for all options can be found at https://github.com/Woprok/AOE4-AdvancedGameSettings
Prevail longer then all your enemies
Achieve highest score before timer ends
Enables for teams to win a game
One for all. All for one.
Conquest requires destruction of first town center to eliminate player
Conquest requires destruction of all age up landmarks to eliminate player
Conquest requires destruction of all additional town centers to eliminate player
Conquest requires destruction of all keeps to eliminate player
Conquest requires destruction of the wonder to eliminate player
Time required to hold all sacred sites
Timer continues from the moment it was interrupted on recapture
Destroying finished wonder will eliminate owner
Scale cost of wonder based on amount of players. This defines additional amount of all resources per player. Price starts at 3000 of each resource.
Players can send resources to allies
Players can set their own alliances
Initial technologies researched for all players
Player Scores are visible when Pinned Player Information is On
Show current solo place in score mode ranking. Team score is evaluated only at the end of the game, if team victory is allowed. Score victory condition does not use same metric as default score.
Time after which will score decide the game
Changes initial population capacity without houses. Will not exceed maximum population capacity.
Changes maximum population capacity. Requires houses to reach it.
Changes initial villager count for each player
Every players starts with a Keep near start
Every players starts with a King near start
Allows construction of the market in Dark Age
Allows siege and ships with target ground to destroy trees
Changes game simulation ticks. This option can not be used in multiplayer and will be disabled.
Multiplies all of the following gathering rates, construction speed, repair rate and production speed by selected value.
Disables construction of additional Town Centers
%1PLAYER_NAME% surrendered in solidarity with his teammate
Treaty is over, prepare for bloodshed.
King will have additional bonuses and abilities
Should team lose a player, remaining members will share his population capacity and resources. Dynamic teams are not eligible for this.
Disables construction of docks in any age, not advised to be used on maps that separate players only by water.
Monarch is subject to no earthly authority, deriving his right to rule directly from the will of God. Just don't question him!
Players that quit will be replaced by AI, instead of being eliminated.
Truly a king of everyone you are.
Your empire was forgotten by the history.
%1PLAYER_NAME% couldn't withstand the glory of the wonder

Fixes colors for diplomacy. This is not intended to serve as color picker (But it can be used as one.). Causes automatic update of colors for each slot, whenever game causes conflicting change. Conflicting settings are automatically resolved.
Used by Enforce Colors to determine which color is used by this slot. Requires Enforce Colors to be allowed.
Multiplies unit movement maximum speed by selected value.
This was not supposed to happen.
Pen is truly strongest weapon in history.
